channel.title: St. Louis Missouri on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in St. Louis Missouri on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: No fly zone over Ferguson affects airport traffic at Lambert-St Louis Airport
item.description:
November 25, 2014, midnight. FAA has issued TFR affecting inbound flights. Airport is still open. Does not impact departures. — Lambert-STL Airport (@flystl) November 25, 2014 FAA TFR, NOTAM : 4/0271 Location : FERGUSON, MO, Tuesday, November 25, 2014 UTC. Not for navigation.
Flightstats shows that traffic is being diverted from the airport.
The FAA has issued a TFR over #Ferguson. But unlike last time, commercial flights are diverting away from @flystl.

item.title: Listening to unrest in Ferguson, MO via Twitter, police and fire scanner, Hot 104.1, KTVI TV
item.description: August 10-11, 2014: It's a tense night in Ferguson, MO after last night's shooting of 18 year old Michael Brown. News account from the St Louis Post Dispatch, with photos: Violence breaks out near site of vigil for teen killed by police. FERGUSON â€¢ A day of protests and vigils Sunday for an unarmed black teenager who was shot to death by a Ferguson police officer erupted Sunday night with confrontations, looting and gunshots.
